item.description:
Level II Ride - over 100 mile day!
Meet at 9:30am with a full tank of gas
Leave at 10:00 am

First break will be in about 25 miles for a quick restroom stop. Lunch will be in another 50 or so miles. We will be at Provender and Grays Ice Cream so you can have lunch and dessert! Check out the link
http://www.tivertonfo...

We will continue on some back roads through Tiverton and Westport. Hop onto rte 88 to 195 to end on 24N for your ride home.

If you want to stay long than just lunch, there are some local shops at Tiverton Four Corners if you want to shop. I can give directions to get you to 24 N before the rest of us head out.
item.name: FIRST RIDE! Backroads of Westport
